Property.name: ExtendedGameplay
Property.HelpText: Super Sonic will be able to do all of Sonic's actions with appropriate animations.

Property.name: ChangeMusic
Property.HelpText: The game will play Super Sonic's theme upon transformation.

Property.name: RemoveLimitations
Property.HelpText: Remove the need for 50 rings & completed story.

Property.name: AlwaysSuperSonic
Property.HelpText: Sonic will always be Super Sonic.

Property.name: CustomPhysics
Property.HelpText: Use more appropriate physics for Super Sonic when outside of the last story.
